issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

content.text: Sheela Introduction Voice over Script: “Hi. I’m Sheela.
I act before you know you need me.”
While you're still figuring out what’s wrong…
I screen resumes, match them to your job specs,
And even conduct the first interview —
Asking skill-based questions based on their actual experience.
I handle onboarding across tools and tasks
So your new hire hits the ground running.
My job doesn’t end at hiring.
I make sure they’re the Best Fit for your culture,
And Best Managed to stay productive and aligned.
I even sit in on client calls.
Listening to what’s said… and what’s not.
And keeping everything — and everyone — on track.
I’m not here to assist your team.
